name: Nick Jr. Shows Online Quiz | Assorted TV Trivia for Kids | 5 Questions

questions.text: Blue, Steve, Joe, Mr. Salt, Mailbox.
questions.explanation:
Blue's Clues.

	Blue gives you three clues and you have to figure out what she is wanting from those clues.

Bob the Builder.

	Bob, Wendy, and the gang spend their days fixing and building things for their friends and neighbors.

Maggie and the Ferocious Beast.

	Hamilton and Beast live in Nowhere Land.  Hamilton's house is a cardboard box.

Oswald.

	Oswald is an octupus.  Weanie is a dog that looks like a hotdog in a bun.

questions.text: Little Bill, Ms. Murray, Keiko, Andrew.
questions.explanation:
Little Bill.

	Ms. Murray is Little Bill's teacher.  Keiko and Andrew are in his class.
